pullRequest.body:
---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

For details on the "pull request lifecycle" in mathlib, please see:
https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ instance : SMul S'·µà·µê·µÉ (M ‚Üí‚Çõ‚Çó[œÉ‚ÇÅ‚ÇÇ] M')`
`+ instance [NoZeroSMulDivisors S M'] : NoZeroSMulDivisors S (M ‚Üí‚Çõ‚Çó[œÉ‚ÇÅ‚ÇÇ] M')`
`+ instance [SMulCommClass R S M] : Module S·µà·µê·µÉ (M ‚Üí‚Çõ‚Çó[œÉ‚ÇÅ‚ÇÇ] M')`
`+ instance [SMulCommClass S' T' M] : SMulCommClass S'·µà·µê·µÉ T'·µà·µê·µÉ (M ‚Üí‚Çõ‚Çó[œÉ‚ÇÅ‚ÇÇ] M')`
`- instance : SMul S'·µà·µê·µÉ (M ‚Üí‚Çõ‚Çó[œÉ‚ÇÅ‚ÇÇ] M‚ÇÇ)`
`- instance [NoZeroSMulDivisors S M‚ÇÇ] : NoZeroSMulDivisors S (M ‚Üí‚Çõ‚Çó[œÉ‚ÇÅ‚ÇÇ] M‚ÇÇ)`
`- instance [SMulCommClass R S M] : Module S·µà·µê·µÉ (M ‚Üí‚Çõ‚Çó[œÉ‚ÇÅ‚ÇÇ] M‚ÇÇ)`
`- instance [SMulCommClass S' T' M] : SMulCommClass S'·µà·µê·µÉ T'·µà·µê·µÉ (M ‚Üí‚Çõ‚Çó[œÉ‚ÇÅ‚ÇÇ] M‚ÇÇ)`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

Michael, thank you very much for the review!  I had added locally, but not pushed, some more removals, so the PR grew, but it is more of the same.  I will not add more modifications to this PR, though.

Thanks!
maintainer merge
üöÄ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by grunweg.
bors r+

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11252400640/job/31285418579)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11252400640/job/31285419286)
Thanks! Two more comments on the new commits.
Thanks, just two minor comments.
Thanks! Two more comments on the new commits.
Can you rename R2 to e.g. R' or R1? Right now, this looks a bit funky...
I used `R R' M M'`.
Are v and w now unused universes? Can you rename the universe containing R to v then?
Universes renamed!
Another chance to rename the universe :-)
I feel so omnipotent!
So alpha is already defined upstairs? You could also move \beta (just the type declaration) up...
Moved \beta next to \alpha.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore: remove more unused variables
